item.title: CNCJ - June, 2020
item.description: [Kubernetes] A demo of Rancher’s RKE Summary Bradley Cloete gave us a glimpse into the power and simplicity of Rancher’s RKE. RKE’s easy Kubernetes life cycle management is a breeze for novice and experts alike. Bradley showed us how Kubernetes' day 2 operations (cluster backup/restore/scale) can be straightforward with RKE. Session Recording References Rancher Academy: Certified Rancher Operator: Level 1

item.title: CNCJ - July, 2020
item.description: Multi-cluster Kubernetes, the easy way [with Rancher] Summary We had the pleasure of hosting Tom Otomanski at our July CNCJ meetup last week. Tom showcased how Rancher enables effortless management of multiple Kubernetes clusters through a single interface. In this session, Tom covered: Creating a Kubernetes cluster on AWS through Rancher Managing Kubernetes cluster with common operations through Rancher Showcased all Kubernetes configurations in the Rancher GUI Session Recording References Slides (PDF) Rancher Server Documentation Rancher Blog Kubernetes Master Class Rancher Academy Rancher Labs YouTube Rancher Users Slack

item.description: If it ain’t broke, rewrite it! - Inject innovation in restrictive environments Summary How do you rewrite code while keeping the business running?
